metadata.title: CVE-2016-6810 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.2, an instance of a cross-site scripting vulnerability was identified to be present in the web based administration console. The root cause of this issue is improper user data output validation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-6810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.14.2+dfsg-1
libactivemq-java - 5.14.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: activemq package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.2+dfsg-1').
